name: CoinTrak
tagline: Live Cryptocurrency Ticker, Calculator, and Investment Tracker for iOS
body:
### Welcome to CoinTrak CoinTrak is the ultimate Cryptocurrency Companion app for iPhone. CoinTrak allows you to keep your portfolio in check with live price updates, conversion between any two currencies, and even check into the balance of any BTC, ETH, or DOGE address on their respective blockchains. Keep your Cryptocurrency Portfolio on track with CoinTrak! ### Live Cryptocurrency Information Cointrak currently employs the services of multiple data sources for its live, up to the minute price data. These sources include CoinMarketCap.com, Cryptonator.com, Blockchain.info, Etherchain.org, and Dogechain.info. Make use of the Main Ticker page for price info for the top currencies ranked by market cap. Tap any currency for price and market information, and double tap for historical data.
### Live Cryptocurrency Conversion Convert between any of the top 100 cryptocurrencies and fiat through the intuitive conversion page. Select which currencies you want to convert from and to from the selector wheels, enter a value, and convert!
### Track your Investment Check the balance of any Bitcoin, Ethereum, or Dogecoin address and store them to keep track of transactions to and from yours, or anyone else's publicly available address with the easy to use Wallet Page! Simply enter the desired address in the corresponding field, press save, and you can check the balance and USD value of anyone's BTC, ETH, or DOGE adress
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
